name: Monsters' Den: Book of Dread
description: Enter the Monsters' Den, a place of endless adventure, battle and reward! Lead your party of four heroes through each level of the ever-changing dungeon, fighting in turn-based battles and hunting for that elusive rare loot. The web-game classic comes to Steam!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.6Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Support for Pixel Shader version 2.x or above Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game has already given me hours and hours of fun and distraction when it was browser-based. I returned to it now, 8 years later, and it's still a great dungeon crawl, and lots of fun. I especially love to try different combination of characters, to see how far it takes me. My favorite combo remains: Warriror, Ranger, Rogue and Cleric.  Can't wait for Godfall!

OMG Great classic RPG here, fully recommend, music and sound effects are great. A bit basic, but heaps of fun. (If you have any neighbors, friends family or flatmates fighting, recommend pumping your sound on your speakers, can drown them out with drama, healing and slashing effects. 8.5 out of 10
